title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part: (a) DOB means Division of the

Budget. (b) Data subject means any
natural person about whom personal information has been collected by an
agency. (c) Personal information
means any data concerning a data subject which, because of name, number, symbol, mark or other identifier, can be used to identify that data
subject. (d) Records access officer
means the deputy director designated by the Director of the Budget to receive
and respond to inquiries to inspect and copy records maintained by the Division
of the Budget. (e) Records access
appeals officer refers to the Director of the Budget or the Executive Deputy

Director, if the director shall so designate, whose business addresses are the

Division of the Budget, State Capitol, Albany, NY 12224. (f) Records mean any item, collection or
grouping of personal information about a data subject which is maintained and
is retrievable by use of name or other identifier of the data subject. The term
record shall not include personal information not used to make a determination
about a data subject, such as: (1)
a telephone
book or directory; (2)
a card
catalog or other resource material in any library; (3)
mailing list information; (4)
personal information required by law to
be maintained, required by law to be used only for statistical research or
reporting purposes; (5)
correspondence files; and
(6)
information requested by the Division of the Budget which is necessary to
answer unsolicited requests by the data subject for information. (g) System of records means any
group of records under the control of the Division of the Budget pertaining to
one or more data subjects from which personal information is retrievable by use
of the name or other identifier of a data subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
145-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
